1 Introduction

Optimizing Commodity Prices, Maximizing Profitability for Farmers

Lucy Li Isaac Lee Zhecheng Yao Martin Ma Vivian Wei
(May 2023)
Abstract

This project entails the development and implementation of a cloud-based statistical and machine-learning framework designed to aid farmers in discerning periods of exceptionally high or low grain prices in their local vicinities. The ultimate objective is to leverage data-driven strategies to maximize farm profitability. The initiative employs a series of hierarchical models and advanced techniques, including SARIMAX, Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN), and Gaussian processes, to optimize commodity pricing for farmers.
